name: Madagascar Magic

description: Smooth and creamy with notes of caramel.

name: Ecuador Essence
description: Deep earthy tones and a rich finish.

description: Lusciously smooth truffle center with a silky shell.

description: Hints of cherry and coffee make this one stand out.

description: Classic milk chocolate with a cocoa-forward twist.

description: Smooth texture and balanced fruity acidity.
